name: media-hoarder
description: Media Hoarder - THE media frontend for data hoarders and movie lovers
author: mk2k <npm@hoarder.software> (https://media.hoarder.software)

scripts.electron:build-linux-portable: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=true && electron-vite build && electron-builder build --linux && mv dist/linux-unpacked media-hoarder-portable && npx bestzip RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64-portable.zip media-hoarder-portable && npx rimraf media-hoarder-portable && node set-portable --portable=false && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist
scripts.electron:build-linux-setup: check-node-version --node ^22 && bash check-killme.sh && bash check-package.json.sh && npx mkdirp RELEASE && node set-portable --portable=false && electron-vite build && electron-builder build --linux deb appimage snap rpm && mv dist/*.deb RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.deb && mv dist/*.AppImage RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.AppImage && mv dist/*.snap RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.snap && mv dist/*.rpm RELEASE/media-hoarder-VERSION-linux-x64.rpm && node set-release-version.js && rimraf dist
